pages.text: A unique bindable item that allows ownership transfer. When bound to yourself and given to another player, any items they bind $(bold)while holding the Key in their offhand$() will be bound to you instead!
Created using an Alchemy Array. Right-click $(item)Arcane Ash$() on the ground to create the array, then right-click a $(item)Binding Reagent$() into it, followed by a $(item)Gold Ingot$().

pages.title: How It Works
pages.text: $(bold)Step 1 - Bind the Key:$()$(br)Right-click the Key to bind it to yourself, like any Blood Magic bound item.$(br2)$(bold)Step 2 - Transfer:$()$(br)Give the bound Key to another player.$(br2)$(bold)Step 3 - Effect:$()$(br)When that player $(bold)holds the Key in their offhand$() and binds Blood Magic items, those items will be bound to $(bold)you$() (the Key's owner) instead of them!

pages.title: Usage
pages.text: $(bold)Unbound Key:$()$(br)If the Key is not bound to anyone, it has no effect and binding works normally.$(br2)$(bold)Applications:$()$(li)Let friends use your bound tools$(li)Create shared bound item pools$(li)Bind items for other players$(br2)$(italic)Transfer the power of binding itself.$()
